bibl.title: P.Köln 511 and Warrior Women.
bibl.note: Connects P. Köln XIII, 511 (= LDAB 218338) with Herodotus' etymologizing of Οἰόρπατα (4.110.1), which he claims to mean ἀνδροκτόνοι and to be the Scythian term for women warriors. Prose fragment (ethnography, novel?). Iambic trimetres cannot be excluded.
bibl.seg: Stephanie West, P.Köln 511 and Warrior Women.

Connects P. Köln XIII, 511 (= LDAB 218338) with Herodotus' etymologizing of Οἰόρπατα (4.110.1), which he claims to mean ἀνδροκτόνοι and to be the Scythian term for women warriors. Prose fragment (ethnography, novel?). Iambic trimetres cannot be excluded.
